name: G'abraege
description:
In this game you must break into a randomly generated  base and kill all of the guards.

(This was made purely for fun and is pretty rough around the edges)

Features:

-Randomly generated bases

-Stealth mechanics

-Buggy, but functional, enemy ai

-Them heckin amazing graphics

-4 different weapons

-Character customization

-Seizures if you win
